1211.content:

"Well i haven't seen it but if we look together im sure we'll find it."
Chi Chi was quick to look troughout every inch of the house while 18 hardly tried. " You know we could probally find it if you were trying." Chi Chi stated in an angervated tone.
"I'll look how i want to look."
"Fine but just let your daughter know she wont get her toy back because mommy would rather sit around on her big fat ass."

That little comment alone was enough to get 18's artificial blood going she would make Chi Chi regret thouse words. Chi Chi had bent down to look under her couches. The pose she took showed off all her lovely curves from her perky breast to her bubble butt. 18 had noticed a little something on the two round moons of Chi Chi's backside: a pantyline. This gave 18 a wonderfull idea.

12111.content:

12111.title: 18 wedgies Chi Chi
